node.page:
[% my $PARENT = getNodeById($$NODE{parent_e2node}); return "This node is unparented. Please contact an administrator to have this repaired" unless($PARENT and $$PARENT{group} and my @grp = @{getNodeById($$NODE{parent_e2node})->{group}}); my $nwriteups = scalar(@grp); my $parent_e2node = getNodeById($$NODE{parent_e2node}); my $nodeTitle=$$parent_e2node{title}; return "(".linkNode($parent_e2node,"see all of $nodeTitle").(($nwriteups == 1)?(", no other writeups in this node)"):(($nwriteups == 2)?(", there is 1 more in this node)"):(", there are ".($nwriteups-1)." more in this node)"))); %]

[{firmlinks}] [{votehead}]
[{e3_displaywriteuptitle:0,timestamp}]
[{displaywriteuptext}]
[{e3_displayWriteupFooter}]
node.title: e3 writeup display page
